changeSet.author: dommas
changeSet.sql: match(n:Gene:db_BioCyc) where size(n.accession)>0 with n match (g:Gene) where g.locus_tag = n.accession merge (n)-[:IS]->(g);

changeSet.author: dommas
changeSet.sql: match(n:db_BioCyc) set n.displayName = n.name; match(n) where (not exists (n.displayName)) or n.displayName = '' set n.displayName = n.biocyc_id; match(n:Regulation:db_BioCyc)-[:TYPE_OF]-(t:db_BioCyc) with n, case when n.mode='+' then t.eid + ' (+)' when n.mode='-' then t.eid + ' (-)' else t.eid end as displayName set n.displayName = displayName; match (n:TranscriptionUnit:db_BioCyc)-[:ELEMENT_OF]-(g:Gene) with n, collect(g.name) as genes with n, case when exists (n.name) then n.name + ' (tu)' else apoc.text.join(apoc.coll.sort(genes), '-') + ' (tu)' end as displayName set n.displayName = displayName;

changeSet.author: dommas
dommas
changeSet.comment: set reaction enzyme_name property based on its connection with Enzyme
changeSet.sql: match(n:Reaction)-[:ENZYME_LINK]-(e) with n, collect(e.name) as enzyme_name set n.enzyme_name = enzyme_name;

changeSet.author: dommas
changeSet.comment: set pathways related to a gene.
changeSet.sql: match (n:db_PseudomonasPutidaKT2440:Gene) with n match path=(n)-[:ENCODES]-()-[:COMPONENT_OF*0..]->()-[]-(:EnzReaction)--(:Reaction)--(p:Pathway:db_PseudomonasPutidaKT2440) with n, collect(p.name) as pathways set n.pathways = pathways
